definitions.definition: A man present at the christening of a baby who promises to help raise the child in a Christian manner; a male godparent who sponsors the baptism of a child.
Someone who plays a key role in fostering the development of something.
A small post which is used in repairing a fence. For instance attached to and supporting an existing broken fence post.

main_definition: ( Christianity ) A man present at the christening of a baby who promises to help raise the child in a Christian manner; a male godparent who sponsors the baptism of a child.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Someone who plays a key role in fostering the development of something.
A small post which is used in repairing a fence. For instance attached to and supporting an existing broken fence post.
